thread.title: Clean and Functional- Great Location
thread.title_full: Clean and Functional- Great Location - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: James D
title: Clean and Functional- Great Location
text: Spent a couple of nights here celebrating a birthday. Hotel was clean and comfortable and the lobby had a really nice bustling feel about it. 24 Hr bar and lobby service making it great for travellers using nearby stations. Short walk to the West End - we didn't need to use public transport. Didn't have high expectations and was pleasantly surprised. Would certainly use again.
